tabsBackgroundColor.description: tabs background color, must be filled in hexadecimal color
tabsBackgroundColor.description_zh: tabs 背景色,必须填写十六进制颜色

tabsActiveTextColor.description: tabs activates the tab-item text color
tabsActiveTextColor.description_zh: tabs 激活 tab-item 文字颜色

tabsInactiveTextColor.description: tabs are inactive tab-item text colors
tabsInactiveTextColor.description_zh: tabs 非激活 tab-item 文字颜色

tabsUnderlineColor.description: tabs activates the tab-item underline color
tabsUnderlineColor.description_zh: tabs 激活 tab-item 下划线颜色

activeName.description: For normal tab bar components only, the name value corresponding to the currently active tab-item must be used with bindtabchange.
activeName.description_zh: 仅用于普通标签栏组件，当前激活 tab-item 的对应的 name 值，须搭配 bindtabchange 一起使用。

urlQueryName.description: It is only used for the addressable tab bar component, and the parameter key in the URL query changed by the current tab needs to be set when the page URL is modified through tabs.
urlQueryName.description_zh: 仅用于可寻址标签栏组件，当前 tab 所改变的 url query 中参数 key，需要通过 tabs 修改页面 url 的时候设置。

maxTabItemAmount.description: The maximum number of tab-items in the current tabs view, below which they are evenly sorted and beyond which they are swiped. There are five by default, which can be adjusted according to business needs
maxTabItemAmount.description_zh: 当前 tabs 视图中最多容纳的 tab-item 数量，低于此数量均分排列，超出此数量划屏。默认五个，开发者可根据业务需求调整

onTabChange.description: The callback of the tab is clicked, you can get the name value corresponding to the currently clicked tab-item in e.detail.name
onTabChange.description_zh: tab 被点击的回调，可以在 e.detail.name 中取到当前点击的 tab-item 对应的 name 值
